data.eml:eml: New Oriental genera in the family Issidae (Hemiptera: Fulgoromorpha)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Yalin (2017): New Oriental genera in the family Issidae (Hemiptera: Fulgoromorpha). Zootaxa 4312 (2): 355-367, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4312.2.10
